episodes.title: The Long Bright Dark
episodes.plot: In 2012, former detective partners Rust Cohle and Martin Hart recap one of their very first cases together involving a serial killer, back in 1995.

episodes.title: Seeing Things
episodes.plot: Cohle and Hart travel around trying to track down leads to their case. Darker sides of Hart's personal and family lives are revealed.

episodes.title: The Locked Room
episodes.plot: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

episodes.title: Who Goes There
episodes.plot: Martin is faced with marital problems. The search for Reggie Ledoux leads the detectives to a motorcycle gang called the Iron Crusaders, which Rust worked undercover in the past.

episodes.title: The Secret Fate of All Life
episodes.plot: Hart and Cohle share the spoils of a solved case; Papania and Gilbough confront the detectives with troubling new intelligence.

episodes.title: Haunted Houses
episodes.plot: Cohle's activities in 2002, when his partnership with Hart disintegrated and he quit the force, are recalled by Maggie.

episodes.title: After You've Gone
episodes.plot: Cohle and Hart try to discover if a series of missing persons reports could be related to the Dora Lange murder and the Tuttle family.

episodes.title: Form and Void
episodes.plot: An overlooked detail provides Hart and Cohle with an important new lead in their 17-year-old case.
